p: Exposed HCWs were defined as HCWs working in the wards where the patient had been hospitalized, and physicians who had cared for the patient between September 10 and October 2, 2016. We traced the movement history of the patient to identify exposed HCWs, and identified 31 HCWs who had been exposed in the ER, 26 HCWs who had been exposed in the general ward, and 5 exposed radiology HCWs.
